p: The different RTL fractions from the EA layers (EAF1 to EAF8) were collected through TLC analysis (Supplementary Figure S1). When the concentration of each fraction was less than 25 μg/ml, the cell survival rate was greater than 80% and did not inhibit cell growth (Supplementary Figure S2). Thus, the concentration of 25 μg/ml was used for the follow-up glucose uptake evaluation.
